item.title: Europe stocks higher as investors assess weak PMI data; euro slumps to two-year low
item.description: European stocks were higher on Friday, as investors reviewed a range of key regional data points.

item.title: Spain slaps $187 million fine on Ryanair, EasyJet and others for 'abusive' cabin luggage fees
item.description: Spain's Consumer Rights ministry demanded that the five low-cost airlines stop charging additional baggage fees.

item.title: Are we any closer to a greener future? Leaders weigh in at the world's largest energy event
item.description: Fossil fuels still dominate the global energy mix at 81.5% in 2023, according to the Energy Institute. So, where are we in the energy transition? Lead...

item.title: Stock futures fall, but Wall Street is still on track for a winning week: Live updates
item.description: The three major stock market averages are poised for a positive week, while bitcoin is hovering just under $100,000.

item.title: Indonesia wants Apple to sweeten its $100 million proposal as tech giant lobbies for iPhone 16 sales
item.description: The Indonesian government expects Apple to invest more than $100 million into the country if it wants to sell its iPhone 16 in the growing market.
